C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: nats-box
command:
work_dir="$(pwd)"
mkdir -p "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/nats"
cd "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/nats"
if ! [ -s context ]; then
  ln -s /etc/nats-contexts context
fi
if ! [ -f context.txt ]; then
  echo -n "default" > context.txt
fi
cd "$work_dir"
exec sh -ec "$0"
args: nats reply --echo echo & pid="$!"; sleep 1; nats request echo hi > /tmp/resp; kill "$pid"; wait; grep -qF hi /tmp/resp

containers.name: kubectl
kubectl
kubectl
nats-box
command:
work_dir="$(pwd)"
mkdir -p "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/nats"
cd "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/nats"
if ! [ -s context ]; then
  ln -s /etc/nats-contexts context
fi
if ! [ -f context.txt ]; then
  echo -n "default" > context.txt
fi
cd "$work_dir"
exec sh -ec "$0"
args: trap true INT TERM; sleep infinity & wait
